SectionBody.Text: This joint resolution applies with respect to the qualification, nomination, and election of members of the Legislature in the primary and general elections held in 2012 and thereafter.

Section.History: s. 8, CS for SJR 1176, 2012 Regular Session.

Note.Text: Reapportionment of senatorial districts by Committee Substitute for Senate Joint Resolution 1176, 2012 Regular Session, was invalidated by the Florida Supreme Court in In re: Senate Joint Resolution of Legislative Apportionment 1176, No. SC12-1 (Fla. March 9, 2012). Section 1, Committee Substitute for Senate Joint Resolution 2-B, 2012 Special Session B, readopted and amended s. 3, Committee Substitute for Joint Resolution 1176, to address the invalidity issues.
